title: bOING bOING Issue 04
creator: Happy Mutants
description: bOING bOING started as a zine in 1988 by Mark Frauenfelder and Carla Sinclair, his wife. Issues were subtitled "The World's Greatest Neurozine". Associate editors included Gareth Branwyn, Jon Lebkowsky, and Paco Nathan. Along with Mondo 2000 , bOING bOING was an influence in the development of the cyberpunk subculture. It reached a maximum circulation of 17,500 copies. Common themes include technology, futurism, science fiction, gadgets, intellectual property, Disney and left-wing politics. The last issue of the zine was #15. Contents welcome! bounging back - letters the 17-point drug policy - carlos b. dingus antero alli interview - mark frauenfelder fun stuff exo-psychology good clean fun - gene mahoney shoppin' club - mark frauenfelder matter reviews twisted image - ace backwords extended trip - carla frauenfelder where jesus walked - tom peters the 1st book of llyod - gaar potter looks at books kind and gentle comics - mark frauenfelder magazine reviews - mark frauenfelder love drug - william l ramseyer comic book retale - michael k minney brain toys: ideafisher software review - mark frauenfelder tastebugs in bed - paul weinman the search for ool - hugo ramseyer punk warriors of planet baltimore - steve swink "not funny ha ha" funnybook review - b barrows posner: out california connection - steve posner exciting news!
